name: MAIN_BLOCK
code:
DATA lv_a TYPE string.
DATA lv_b TYPE string.
DATA lv_text TYPE string.
DATA lv_x1 TYPE xstring.
DATA lv_x2 TYPE xstring.
DATA lv_x TYPE xstring.
CONCATENATE lv_a lv_b INTO lv_text.
CONCATENATE lv_a lv_b INTO lv_text IN CHARACTER MODE.
CONCATENATE lv_x1 lv_x2 INTO lv_x.
CONCATENATE lv_x1 lv_x2 INTO lv_x IN BYTE MODE.
